> Word count: `r wordcountaddin::word_count()`
=======
```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r message = FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r message = FALSE}
table1<- candidates %>%
  full_join(house_elections, by = c("cand_id" = "fec_id")) 
 
```

```{r message = FALSE}
table1%>%
  group_by(cand_state) %>%
  summarize(N= n())%>%
  #filter(cand_state == "NY") %>%
  arrange(desc(N))
  
```
